user.title: ThesslaGreen Modbus Configuration
user.description: Configure connection to ThesslaGreen AirPack via Modbus TCP. The integration will automatically detect available device functions and registers.

data_description.host: IP address of the AirPack device on your local network
data_description.name: Device name in Home Assistant

confirm.title: Confirm Configuration

error.cannot_connect: Cannot connect to device. Check IP address, port, and network connection.
error.invalid_auth: Authentication error. Check Slave ID settings.
error.unknown: Unexpected error. Check logs for details.

abort.already_configured: Device with this IP address and Slave ID is already configured.

init.title: ThesslaGreen Modbus Options

data_description.scan_interval: How often to read data from device (10-300 seconds)
data_description.timeout: Maximum time to wait for response (5-60 seconds)
data_description.retry: How many times to retry failed reads (1-5 attempts)
data_description.force_full_register_list: Skip scanning and load all registers (may cause errors)

set_special_mode.name: Set Special Mode
set_special_mode.description: Sets special operating mode of the heat recovery unit (BOOST, ECO, FIREPLACE, HOOD, etc.)

set_air_quality_thresholds.name: Set Air Quality Thresholds
set_air_quality_thresholds.description: Configures thresholds for air quality control system

set_temperature_curve.name: Set Heating Curve
set_temperature_curve.description: Configures heating curve for heating system

reset_settings.name: Reset Settings
reset_settings.description: Resets user settings to default values

set_modbus_parameters.name: Set Modbus Parameters
set_modbus_parameters.description: Configures Modbus communication parameters (for advanced users only)

set_device_name.name: Set Device Name
set_device_name.description: Sets custom device name (max 16 ASCII characters)

refresh_device_data.name: Refresh Device Data
refresh_device_data.description: Forces immediate refresh of device data
